full_threads.body:
That is fabulous, thanks. The only thing which I notice on review is that Bill Analysis sub page still has old header "What caused this" and also when you scroll though sub page carousel the Configurable reporting page still comes up. This should be removed as we made that one a bullet point. Thanks Rica for turning this around so fast.

Dave

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica

Please find attached changes required and images. We have a value of work under our subscription each month. If this is more just ask Heath to ping me with an estimate.

Hi David, 

Hope all is well. The image file format should be JPG or PNG and the size should be at least 1280w x 768h or 1920w x 1080h.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

@rica Hi rika, this is the format we need
JPG or PNG format
File size does not matter I will optimize it before uploading it to the site
atleast 1280w x 768h or 1920w x 1080h
